title: Shipping cost of Riot Merchandise store

embed.description: For shipping and delivery information, click here . What if he had a real weapon? Approximate Measurements: Height: 4.5 in / 11.43 cm Width: 3.75 in / 9

body:
Hi
Currently, I'm very interested in the Jax figure selling in the oce merchandise store of riot. 
(The link is https://oce.merch.riotgames.com/en/collectibles/figures/jax.html) 
But apparently the shipping cost is too expensive $29, compare to the item only $28 for the figure. 
Is there any way to pick up the item or any other shipping method ? I live in VIC, Australia.
Thanks.

replies.body: I am trying to buy one tibbers onesie and one urf onesie which cost $140 in total, yet the shipping is $155, makes the total $310 with tax{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

LOL

I've heard of getting ripped off in the P&H, but to have it cost **more than the product itself?**

Try eBay. Maybe someone brought it and didn't like it. They generally have reasonable P&H.
